backend/main.mo: Defines hotel booking canister types, storage maps, and mixin-based authorization and invite-link logic with partial invite code generation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, favicon, root div, and loading the main React script.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Markdown checklist for validating authentication, authorization, room management, and booking flows after the V24 behavior restoration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, auth/role guards, QueryClient, and rendering AppShell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version constant set to 'v24-restored'.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays a table of all bookings with status, totals, and a details dialog, using a bookings query and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Shows hotels with controls to toggle active status and subscription level, including badges and async updates with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate invite tokens bound to a hotel principal and list existing tokens with copy functionality and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access denied message with required role info, navigation options, and a hotel activation flow when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays permission-check errors with retry and home navigation options, reloading role queries on retry.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Lets hotel users validate and consume invite tokens to activate accounts, providing success/error toasts and form feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate component that forces newly authenticated users without a saved profile to complete a name/email/phone form before accessing children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and blocks access until Internet Identity login is complete, showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and hotel activation before rendering children, showing loading or error screens when access is restricted.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog that displays detailed booking information and optionally allows copying the guest principal ID.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Booking form for selecting dates and guest count, calculating price, and submitting a new booking request.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Badge component that maps booking status values to user-friendly labels and visual variants.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Modal dialog for displaying a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Debug panel showing real‑time Internet Identity authentication, role, admin status, and hotel activation details.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays a table of hotel bookings fetched by hotel ID with loading and empty states, including status badges and a details dialog.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages hotel payment methods allowing adding and removing methods with validation, form handling, and table display.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Allows editing hotel profile details including name, location, address, map link, and contact info with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Lists eligible bookings to mark stays as completed and provides an action to record stay completion with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photos with failed-image handling, thumbnail grids, and optional compact mode with click callbacks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Displays and manages hotel rooms, supporting creation and editing of room details with image uploads and a modal form.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription and activation status with badges and alerts, showing contact instructions when inactive or unpaid.
Provides the main layout wrapper with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build information.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a language dropdown allowing users to switch the locale (currently only English).
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login/logout, user role checks, and conditional links for admin, hotel, and account areas.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact and payment info for hotel activation or subscription with WhatsApp and email actions.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Lists hotel payment methods and provides buttons to contact the hotel via WhatsApp or email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context for login, logout, identity retrieval, and authentication state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, admin status, and invite tokens via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements a hook for uploading image files as data URLs with progress tracking and simple error handling.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Defines a locale context with persistence in localStorage and exposes a provider and hook for accessing and updating the app's locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React root, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user identity, role, hotel profile status, and supports invite token validation, token consumption, and admin elevation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard containing panels for managing invite tokens, hotel visibility, and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays hotels with representative room photos, including preview and fallback handling for missing images.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows a guest’s bookings overview and navigation options, including browsing hotels and viewing account status.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Hotel management dashboard that loads the caller’s hotel profile and displays panels for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays public hotel details, rooms, photos, and booking form based on hotelId from the URL, handling loading and missing states.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Main landing menu allowing navigation to guest or hotel portals, with logic based on authentication, roles, and hotel activation.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Type definitions mirroring the backend API, including hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, subscriptions, and queries.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility that enables debug mode in development or when the URL contains debug=1.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Currency formatting utilities with supported currency lists and helpers for names and validation.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs including direct blobs and data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project rollback state, describing Version 25 role regression issues, existing features, and pending authorization fix requests.
